page.title: 03Muness Castle,Uyeasound.
page.content: To get to Muness Castle you need to travel 3 kilometres east from Uyeasound Village. It was built in 1598 by Laurence Bruce when he came to Uyeasound after being involved in a murderous squabble. Today Muness Castle is a ruin.The roof has gone and so has the third floor.When people lived in the castle there was a forest below the castle. This is known because tree bark has been found in the peat bogs. The Custodian of the castle was asked some questions.She has a visitors' book and last year three and a half thousand people visited the castle.The Custodian also shows people around the castle,sells leaflets,keeps the castle tidy and cuts the grass.
